mapper.select: SELECT ORD_NUM , ORD_REQUEST_DATE , ORD_DELIVERY_DATE , OPER_CODE , OPER_NAME FROM ORDER_M WHERE ORD_NUM=#{ordNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( select m.ord_num , to_char(m.ord_request_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ord_request_date , to_char(m.ORD_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') as ORD_DELIVERY_DATE , m.oper_code , m.oper_name , d.ord_d_num , d.ITM_CODE , item.itm_name , d.ORD_STATUS , d.ORD_VOL , d.ORD_IND_VOL , d.ORD_OUT_VOL , i.ITM_VOL as itm_stock , d.ORD_NOTE , d.PRD_CHK from order_d d, order_m m,ITEM_STOCK i, item where m.ORD_NUM=d.ORD_NUM and i.ITM_CODE=d.ITM_CODE and item.ITM_CODE=d.ITM_CODE
and d.ord_d_num < ${ordDNum}
and
to_date(m.ORD_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_date(#{bDate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(m.ORD_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_date(#{aDate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd')
to_date(m.ORD_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_date(#{bDate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(m.ORD_DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_date(#{aDate} ,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and m.oper_code like '%' || #{operCode} || '%'
and i.ITM_CODE like '%' || #{itmCode} || '%'
ORDER BY d.ORD_D_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )
